```{r Question_1}
set.seed(123)
q1_df = tibble(
  x = runif(10, min = 0, max = 5),
  vec_logical = x > 2,
  vec_char = c("Q", "W", "E", "R","T","Y","U","I","O","P"),
  vec_factor = factor(c("girl", "boy", "girl", "boy","girl", "boy", "girl", "boy","girl", "boy"))
)
p1_df

mean(p1_df$x)
mean(p1_df$vec_logical)
mean(p1_df$vec_char)
mean(p1_df$vec_factor)
```
